alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 27 at 1:38AM MST until January 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with the highest amounts in the foothills. * WHERE...Red Lodge Foothills, Beartooth Foothills and Southeastern Carbon. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads, including US-212, will become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall is expected tonight into Saturday.
info.instruction: People should consider delaying travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon
